languages.text: {n}Вы пытаетесь воскресить в памяти лица ваших друзей и соратников, но все они словно покрыты непроглядным маревом. Боль мешает сфокусироваться хотя бы на одном из них, и вас начинают обуревать злость и отчаянье. Вы должны вспомнить, вы не можете тут умереть! Подстегнутые безысходностью, вы предпринимаете еще одну попытку подняться.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Вы пытаетесь воскресить в памяти лица ваших друзей и соратников, но все они словно покрыты непроглядным маревом. Боль мешает сфокусироваться хотя бы на одном из них, и вас начинают обуревать злость и отчаянье. Вы должны вспомнить, вы не можете тут умереть! Подстегнутые безысходностью, вы предпринимаете еще одну попытку подняться.{/n}

languages.text: {n}You try to resurrect the faces of your friends in your memory, but they all seem to be cloaked by an impenetrable haze. Pain prevents you from focusing on any one of them, and anger and despair start to overwhelm you. You must remember, you cannot die here! Spurred on by hopelessness, you make another attempt to get up.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}Вы пытаетесь воскресить в памяти лица ваших друзей и соратников, но все они словно покрыты непроглядным маревом. Боль мешает сфокусироваться хотя бы на одном из них, и вас начинают обуревать злость и отчаянье. Вы должны вспомнить, вы не можете тут умереть! Подстегнутые безысходностью, вы предпринимаете еще одну попытку подняться.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}You try to resurrect the faces of your friends in your memory, but they all seem to be covered by an impenetrable haze. The pain prevents you from focusing on at least one of them, and anger and despair start to overwhelm you. You must remember, you cannot die here! Spurred on by hopelessness, you make another attempt to get up.{/n}

The pain prevents you from focusing on at least one of them, and anger and despair start to overwhelm you. You must remember, you cannot die here! Spurred on by hopelessness, you make another attempt to get up.{/n}

Spurred on by hopelessness, you make another attempt to get up.{/n}

{n}You try to resurrect the faces of your friends in your memory, but they all seem to be cloaked by an impenetrable haze. Pain prevents you from focusing on any one of them, and anger and despair start to overwhelm you. You must remember, you cannot die here! Spurred on by hopelessness, you make another attempt to get up.{/n}

languages.text: {n}你试着回想起伙伴们的面孔，但这些面孔似乎被隐藏在无法穿透的阴霾之中。由于疼痛，你根本无法集中精神进行回忆，你心中的愤怒与绝望渐渐占了上风。你必须想起一切，你绝不能死在这里！在绝望的刺激之下，你再次尝试着站起身来。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to resurrect the faces of your friends in your memory, but they all seem to be cloaked by an impenetrable haze. Pain prevents you from focusing on any one of them, and anger and despair start to overwhelm you. You must remember, you cannot die here! Spurred on by hopelessness, you make another attempt to get up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}你试着回想起伙伴们的面孔，但这些面孔似乎被隐藏在无法穿透的阴霾之中。由于疼痛，你根本无法集中精神进行回忆，你心中的愤怒与绝望渐渐占了上风。你必须想起一切，你绝不能死在这里！在绝望的刺激之下，你再次尝试着站起身来。{/n}

languages.text: {n}記憶をたどり友人たちの顔を思い出そうとするが、濃い霧に覆われているかのようだ。思いだそうにも痛みで集中力が途切れてしまい、怒りと悲嘆で焦燥感に駆られる。ここで死ぬわけにはいかない！絶望に駆られ、もう一度立ち上がろうとした。{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to resurrect the faces of your friends in your memory, but they all seem to be cloaked by an impenetrable haze. Pain prevents you from focusing on any one of them, and anger and despair start to overwhelm you. You must remember, you cannot die here! Spurred on by hopelessness, you make another attempt to get up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}記憶をたどり友人たちの顔を思い出そうとするが、濃い霧に覆われているかのようだ。思いだそうにも痛みで集中力が途切れてしまい、怒りと悲嘆で焦燥感に駆られる。ここで死ぬわけにはいかない！絶望に駆られ、もう一度立ち上がろうとした。{/n}

languages.text: {n}Intentas recuperar los rostros de tus amigos de tu memoria, pero parecen estar ocultos tras una niebla impenetrable. El dolor te impide concentrarte en ninguno de ellos, y la furia y la frustración empiezan a superarte. Tienes que recordar. ¡No puedes morir aquí! Impulsad{mf|o|a} por la desesperación, intentas levantarte una vez más.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to resurrect the faces of your friends in your memory, but they all seem to be cloaked by an impenetrable haze. Pain prevents you from focusing on any one of them, and anger and despair start to overwhelm you. You must remember, you cannot die here! Spurred on by hopelessness, you make another attempt to get up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Intentas recuperar los rostros de tus amigos de tu memoria, pero parecen estar ocultos tras una niebla impenetrable. El dolor te impide concentrarte en ninguno de ellos, y la furia y la frustración empiezan a superarte. Tienes que recordar. ¡No puedes morir aquí! Impulsad{mf|o|a} por la desesperación, intentas levantarte una vez más.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Vous essayez de vous remémorer les visages de vos amis, mais ils semblent tous enveloppés d'une brume impénétrable. La douleur vous empêche de vous concentrer et, très vite, la colère et le découragement vous submergent. Vous devez vous souvenir ! Vous ne pouvez pas mourir ici ! {mf|Mu|Mue} par le désespoir, vous tentez de nouveau de vous relever.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to resurrect the faces of your friends in your memory, but they all seem to be cloaked by an impenetrable haze. Pain prevents you from focusing on any one of them, and anger and despair start to overwhelm you. You must remember, you cannot die here! Spurred on by hopelessness, you make another attempt to get up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Vous essayez de vous remémorer les visages de vos amis, mais ils semblent tous enveloppés d'une brume impénétrable. La douleur vous empêche de vous concentrer et, très vite, la colère et le découragement vous submergent. Vous devez vous souvenir ! Vous ne pouvez pas mourir ici ! {mf|Mu|Mue} par le désespoir, vous tentez de nouveau de vous relever.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Du versuchst, in deinem Gedächtnis die Gesichter deiner Freunde wiederzubeleben, aber sie alle scheinen sich in einem undurchdringlichen Dunst zu befinden. Der Schmerz verhindert, dass du dich auf eine Person konzentrieren kannst, und Wut und Verzweiflung beginnen dich zu überwältigen. Du musst dich erinnern, du darfst hier nicht sterben! Von Hoffnungslosigkeit angetrieben, versuchst du erneut, aufzustehen.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to resurrect the faces of your friends in your memory, but they all seem to be cloaked by an impenetrable haze. Pain prevents you from focusing on any one of them, and anger and despair start to overwhelm you. You must remember, you cannot die here! Spurred on by hopelessness, you make another attempt to get up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Du versuchst, in deinem Gedächtnis die Gesichter deiner Freunde wiederzubeleben, aber sie alle scheinen sich in einem undurchdringlichen Dunst zu befinden. Der Schmerz verhindert, dass du dich auf eine Person konzentrieren kannst, und Wut und Verzweiflung beginnen dich zu überwältigen. Du musst dich erinnern, du darfst hier nicht sterben! Von Hoffnungslosigkeit angetrieben, versuchst du erneut, aufzustehen.{/n}

languages.text: {n}Arkadaşlarının yüzlerini hafızanda canlandırmaya çalışıyorsun ancak hepsi de aşılamaz bir sisin arkasına gizlenmiş gibi. Acı nedeniyle hiçbirine odaklanamıyorsun. İçindeki öfke ve üzüntü, benliğini ele geçirmeye başlıyor. Hatırlaman gerek: Burada ölemezsin! Umutsuzluğundan güç alarak bir kez daha kalkmayı deniyorsun.{/n}
languages.original_text: {n}You try to resurrect the faces of your friends in your memory, but they all seem to be cloaked by an impenetrable haze. Pain prevents you from focusing on any one of them, and anger and despair start to overwhelm you. You must remember, you cannot die here! Spurred on by hopelessness, you make another attempt to get up.{/n}

traits.locale_text: {n}Arkadaşlarının yüzlerini hafızanda canlandırmaya çalışıyorsun ancak hepsi de aşılamaz bir sisin arkasına gizlenmiş gibiler. Acı nedeniyle herhangi birine odaklanamıyorsun ve içindeki öfke ve üzüntü, benliğini ele geçirmeye başlıyor. Hatırlaman gerek: Burada ölemezsin! Umutsuzluğundan güç alarak bir kez daha kalkmayı deniyorsun.{/n}
